title: RFK Jr.’s vaccine committee bloodbath: I hope you’re all up-to-date on your vaccines…
description: ...because the CDC schedule is about to start shedding vaccines the way antivax newly appointed ACIP members think people vaccinated against COVID-19 shed spike protein. Ground zero for RFK Jr.'s extinction-level event with respect to public health is vaccines and the committee that recommends them for the CDC schedule. The post RFK Jr.’s vaccine committee bloodbath: I hope you’re all up-to-date on your vaccines… first appeared on Science-Based Medicine.
author: David Gorski
categories: Department of Health and Human Services
